Player Command
==============

See: :doc:`feelings <feelings>` :doc:`adverbs <adverbs>` :doc:`semote <semote>` 


USAGE
  |  ``random2``
  |  ``random2 <name>``

This command will randomly select a feeling to execute. This one might be slightly broke.
